rows.label: qst201804_msg0001
rows.name:
What, you again? I toldja, I've got
nothing to say to you.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0002
rows.name: I'm sorry for intruding so suddenly!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0003
rows.name:
Here, I brought you a little something.
You like these, right?

rows.label: qst201804_msg0004
rows.name: Yoho, Pinfins!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0005
rows.name: They're not...poisoned, are they...?

rows.label: qst201804_msg0006
rows.name:
I'm hurt! I would never!
Relax and just dig in!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0007
rows.name: Hm. Well, in that case...

rows.label: qst201804_msg0008
rows.name:
Hey, all'a y'all!
They're giving out Pinfins here!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0009
rows.name:
Ahh... *burp*
That was tasty.
I'm so full.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0010
rows.name: You're not as bad as you look, kid.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0011
rows.name:
Well, you did all right by me with the
Pinfins, so I guess I can tell you stuff.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0012
rows.name: What didja want to know?

rows.label: qst201804_msg0013
rows.name:
Well, actually, we're looking for a
Phonex by the name of Pepe...

rows.label: qst201804_msg0014
rows.name: Do you know anything that might help?

rows.label: qst201804_msg0015
rows.name: Pepe! Of course I know 'im!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0016
rows.name: Really?!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0017
rows.name:
Mimi and Pepe left the settlement
together, and stayed gone for a while...

rows.label: qst201804_msg0018
rows.name:
Then recently, Pepe came back on 'is
own. Well, he seemed happy enough,
so I didn't think too much about it.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0019
rows.name: And where might Pepe be now...?

rows.label: qst201804_msg0020
rows.name:
Ahh, he gathered some more pals and
they left, sayin' they'd go to another
country or whatever.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0021
rows.name:
Do you know why?
Did someone think to ask?

rows.label: qst201804_msg0022
rows.name:
He did mention he was lookin' for
strong companions, quote unquote,
but that's all I know.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0023
rows.name:
Someone said they'd boarded a boat
to Invidia, so, uh...

rows.label: qst201804_msg0024
rows.name:
It might be an idea to hit up the
Phonexes over there?

rows.label: qst201804_msg0025
rows.name:
Invidia?
Not Superbia?

rows.label: qst201804_msg0026
rows.name: No, I'm pretty sure it was Invidia.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0027
rows.name:
Huh... I could've bet it would be
Superbia...

rows.label: qst201804_msg0028
rows.name: ...Why so disappointed?

rows.label: qst201804_msg0029
rows.name:
No way!
Wait, what if...!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0030
rows.name:
They may have gotten targeted by
the Superbians after they landed!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0031
rows.name:
...This conversation jump too much
for Tora to follow.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0032
rows.name:
That has to be it!
Quickly, we have to go save them!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0033
rows.name:
Uka, you have to chill out.
I think you're letting your mind
run away with you...

rows.label: qst201804_msg0034
rows.name: No, but you see? It could be too late!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0035
rows.name:
Everyone!
We have to get to Invidia, ASAP!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0036
rows.name:
Let's find the Phonex community there
and ask them what's what!
